title: NC 133 heading north from Southport - in the general area of Town of Brunswick - although both sides of the road have thinned the pine trees, in particular the left side of the road has done massive removals, lots of the area completely cleared, now the area has new fencing around it with gates.  What is being proposed for this huge area of land?
